attributes.action: Lobby The United Nations, For The Removal, By Force if Necessary The Regime Of Robert Mugabe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The United Nations, Has the Authority to intervene in Zimbabwe, We ask the Prime Minister to Gather A consensus in The United Nations, For The Immediate Removal Of The Dictatorial Regime In Zimbabwe.

By Force if Necessary.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
